simulations.name: Upgrade Level
simulations.assumption: Increase to the next level if not Level 3
simulations.explanation: You are already at the maximum Level 3; no further upgrade is possible, so the interest remains unchanged.

simulations.name: Top-up to Tier Cap
simulations.assumption: Increase balance up to the cap of the current tier
simulations.explanation: Your current balance already hits the Tier 1 cap of S$75,000, so topping up would not increase the interest.

simulations.name: Upgrade Tier
simulations.assumption: Increase to the next TIER if not Tier 3
simulations.explanation: By increasing the average balance to S$125,000 you unlock the full Tier 2 bonus (S$50,000 at 2.95% bonus) in addition to the existing Tier 1 bonus, raising the monthly interest from S$95.56 to S$222.95.

recommended_action.reasoning: The first scenario that yields a positive incremental gain is the Upgrade Tier scenario, with an increase of S$127.39 in monthly interest.
next_steps: Deposit or transfer funds to bring the average balance to at least S$125,000 to fully access Tier 2 bonus.
Maintain Level 3 status by ensuring the annual salary credit of S$150,000 and minimum monthly card spend of S$4,000 are met.
Confirm the new balance and tier status in the account dashboard and enjoy the higher monthly interest.
